title: PS4 or Xbox One?

transcript: What's up guys? Lou here back with another video And today It's another giveaway Maybe it's a celebration of close to two million subscribers One of you, one lucky person is gonna win one of these two Your choice, either an XBOX ONE or PS4, but they're not avarage every day consoles These ones have been customized using Dbrand skins In fact, they were sent to me via Dbrand skins And I'll drop a link in the description if you wanna check those guys out But this video is all about giving one of these away to a lucky subscriber. And, it's not gonna be the same console that all your friends, cousins, and so on have underneath their tv These are gonna be special, just to you, of course, you can do this kind of customization yourself if you've already got a console But if you win one of these you could be sure it's gonna be fairly unique.
